name: Lupine Neo Light Headband
description: Turn your bike light into your headlamp. The Neo Light Headband allows you to wear your super-bright Lupine bike light on your head.Works with your Neo or 2015 and older Piko light heads (does not fit 2016 and newer Piko/Piko R light heads).Top strap reduces light bounce when moving quickly – a big plus for trail running.
